name: v0
title: v0
description: Create, view and manage your v0 chats within Raycast
author: garrett

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Default API Key
preferences.description: Generate an account token scoped to 'Full Account'. Get one from https://vercel.com/account/settings/tokens

commands.name: manage-profiles
commands.title: Manage Profiles
commands.description: Manage your v0 API key profiles for different teams (SSO/non-SSO)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
